H0.text: The traditional 'badge of honour/honor' title for a fully qualified surgeon/medical consultant is. Doctor

H1.text: The traditional 'badge of honour/honor' title for a fully qualified surgeon/medical consultant is. Professor

H2.text: The traditional 'badge of honour/honor' title for a fully qualified surgeon/medical consultant is. Surgeon

H3.text: The traditional 'badge of honour/honor' title for a fully qualified surgeon/medical consultant is. Mr

A4.text: The status and rank of consultant surgeons, addressed as 'Mister' or 'Ms.', and consultant physicians, addressed as 'Doctor', is equivalent.

A5.text: Surgeons do not use the title of Dr and, due to the origins of surgery with the barber surgeons, instead use Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, etc.
